mapper.select: select a.* from ma_wf_act a order by a.DATASEQ
select a.* from ma_wf_act a where guid = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
insert into ma_wf_act ( guid, mawffk, actname, description, title, position, gate, ACTIVITYTYPE, ROUTEMODEL, startmin, startmax, SUBWFNAME, subtype, DATASEQ, PROCESSMODE, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #MAWFFK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ACTNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #POSITION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #GATE#, #ACTIVITYTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ROUTEMODEL:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STARTMIN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STARTMAX:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SUBWFNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SUBTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ#, #PROCESSMODE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update ma_wf_act
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, mawffk=#MAWFFK#, actname=#ACTNAME#, description=#DESCRIPTION#, title=#TITLE#, position=#POSITION#, gate=#GATE#, ACTIVITYTYPE=#ACTIVITYTYPE#, ROUTEMODEL=#ROUTEMODEL#, startmin=#STARTMIN#, startmax=#STARTMAX#, SUBWFNAME=#SUBWFNAME#, subtype=#SUBTYPE#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, PROCESSMODE=#PROCESSMODE#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
